block_info.label: Correlation
block_info.description: Correlation block targeted for AI Engines.

parameters.name: api
parameters.description: IO interface: 0 for windows, 1 for streams
parameters.label: api:

parameters.name: data_type_f
parameters.description: describes the type of individual data samples of signal F to input to the function.
parameters.label: F input data type:

parameters.name: data_type_g
parameters.description: describes the type of individual data samples of signal G to input to the function.
parameters.label: G input data type:

parameters.name: data_type_out
parameters.description: describes the type of individual data samples at the function output.
parameters.label: Output data type:

parameters.name: function_type
parameters.description: describes the selection of function i.e correlation.
parameters.label: function_type:

parameters.name: compute_mode
parameters.description: describes the computation mode of correlation. we have 3 modes which are Full(0), Same(1), Valid(2).
parameters.label: Computation mode:

parameters.name: f_sample_size
parameters.description: describes the number of samples in vector F.
parameters.label: F input length:

parameters.name: g_sample_size
parameters.description: describes the number of samples in vector G.
parameters.label: G input length:

parameters.name: USE_RTP_VECTOR_LENGTHS
parameters.description: enable runtime parameter input port to specify G input length at runtime
parameters.label: Specify G input length via input port

parameters.name: num_frames
parameters.description: describes the number of frames of input data samples that occur within each input window of data.
parameters.label: Number of frames:

parameters.name: shift_output
parameters.description: describes the number of bits to downshift.
parameters.label: Scale output down by 2^:

parameters.name: rnd_mode
parameters.description: describes the selection of rounding to be applied during the shift down stage of processing.
parameters.label: Rounding mode:

parameters.name: sat_mode
parameters.description: describes the selection of saturation to be applied during the shift down stage of processing.
parameters.label: Saturation mode:

parameters.name: no_of_kernels
parameters.description: Specifies the number of parallel input/output paths where samples are interleaved between paths, giving an overall higher throughput.
parameters.label: SSR:

parameters.name: casc_length
parameters.description: describes the number of AIE processors to split the operation over.
parameters.label: Number of cascade stages:
